titleStmt.title: The tryal of Elizabeth Cellier, the popish midwife, at the Old Baily, Septemb. 11, 1680, for printing and publishing the late notorious libel, intituled, Malice defeated, &c. where she was found guilty : together with her sentence.
titleStmt.author: Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680, defendant.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Godbid, for L.C.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
